typeparam.span: 泛型类型的基础值类型。

span.span: The underlying value type of the generic type.

summary.span: 表示可分配有 的值类型。

span.span: Represents a value type that can be assigned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果可以为类型赋值或将其分配到 `null`，则称该类型为 null，这意味着该类型没有任何值。A type is said to be nullable if it can be assigned a value or can be assigned `null`, which means the type has no value whatsoever. 默认情况下，所有引用类型（如 ）都可以为 null，但所有值类型（如 ）都不是。By default, all reference types, such as , are nullable, but all value types, such as , are not. 在C#和 Visual Basic 中，通过在值类型后使用 `?` 表示法，将值类型标记为可以为 null。In C# and Visual Basic, you mark a value type as nullable by using the `?` notation after the value type. 例如，在 Visual Basic 中C# `int?` 或 `Integer?` 声明可以 `null`分配的整数值类型。For example, `int?` in C# or `Integer?` in Visual Basic declares an integer value type that can be assigned `null`. 结构支持仅将值类型用作可以为 null 的类型，因为引用类型在设计上是可以为 null 的。The structure supports using only a value type as a nullable type because reference types are nullable by design. 类提供 结构的互补支持。The class provides complementary support for the structure. 类支持获取可以为 null 的类型的基础类型，以及针对其基础值类型不支持泛型比较和相等运算的可以为 null 的类型对的比较和相等性运算。The class supports obtaining the underlying type of a nullable type, and comparison and equality operations on pairs of nullable types whose underlying value type does not support generic comparison and equality operations. ## 基本属性Fundamental Properties 结构的两个基本成员是 和 属性。The two fundamental members of the structure are the and properties. 如果 对象的 属性为 `true`，则可以使用 属性访问对象的值。If the property for a object is `true`, the value of the object can be accessed with the property. 如果 `false` 属性，则对象的值是不确定的，尝试访问 属性将引发 。If the property is `false`, the value of the object is undefined and an attempt to access the property throws an . ## 装箱和取消装箱Boxing and Unboxing 当对可以为 null 的类型进行装箱时，公共语言运行时将自动框 对象的基础值，而不是 对象本身。When a nullable type is boxed, the common language runtime automatically boxes the underlying value of the object, not the object itself. 也就是说，如果 属性为 `true`，则 属性的内容为装箱。That is, if the property is `true`, the contents of the property is boxed. 如果可以为 null 的类型的基础值为取消装箱，则公共语言运行时将创建一个新的 结构，该结构已初始化为基础值。When the underlying value of a nullable type is unboxed, the common language runtime creates a new structure initialized to the underlying value. 如果 `false`可以为 null 的类型的 `HasValue` 属性，则会 `null`装箱操作的结果。If the `HasValue` property of a nullable type is `false`, the result of a boxing operation is `null`. 因此，如果将一个装箱的可以为 null 的类型传递给需要对象参数的方法，则该方法必须准备好处理参数 `null`的情况。Consequently, if a boxed nullable type is passed to a method that expects an object argument, that method must be prepared to handle the case where the argument is `null`. 将 `null` 取消装箱为可以为 null 的类型时，公共语言运行时将创建一个新的 结构，并将其 `HasValue` 属性初始化为 `false`。When `null` is unboxed into a nullable type, the common language runtime creates a new structure and initializes its `HasValue` property to `false`. ## [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)] 和 Windows 运行时组件and Windows Runtime Components 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)]开始，可以将 类型包含为在 WinMD 库中导出的结构的成员。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)], you can include a type as a member of a structure exported in a WinMD library. 以前，此操作不受支持。Previously, this was not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了 Microsoft Pubs 示例数据库中表的三行。The following code example defines three rows of a table in the Microsoft Pubs sample database. 该表包含两个不可为 null 的列和两个可以为 null 的列。The table contains two columns that are not nullable and two columns that are nullable. [!code-cpp[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cpp/tarow.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cs/tarow.cs#1)] [!code-vb[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/vb/tarow.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将新 对象的 属性初始化为 `true`，并将 属性初始化为 `value` 参数的值。The constructor initializes the property of the new object to `true`, and the property to the value of the `value` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前 结构的 属性是 `true`，并且 `other` 参数不是 `null`的，则通过将 `other` 参数传递到当前 `Equals` 结构的基础值的 方法来确定相等性。If the property of the current structure is `true` and the `other` argument is not `null`, equality is determined by passing the `other` parameter to the `Equals` method of the underlying value of the current structure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定对象和 对象是否等于当前的 对象。The following code example determines whether an object and a object are equal to the current object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使 属性 `false` （与引发异常的 属性不同）， 方法也会返回一个值。The method returns a value even if the property is `false` (unlike the property, which throws an exception). 如果 `false` 属性，则该方法将返回基础类型的[默认](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default-values-table)值。If the property is `false`, the method returns the [default](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default-values-table) value of the underlying type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索 对象的值（如果定义了该值）;否则，它将检索默认值或特定的默认值。The following code example retrieves the value of a object if that value is defined; otherwise, it retrieves the default value or a specific default value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true` 属性，则可以通过 属性访问当前 对象的值。If the property is `true`, the value of the current object can be accessed with the property. 否则，尝试访问其值会引发 异常。Otherwise, attempting to access its value throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `Nullable` （`Nullable(Of Integer)` Visual Basic）对象中的 属性来确定它应显示对象的 属性还是显示其 属性。The following example uses the property of a `Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) object to determine whether it should display the object's property or its property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此运算符支持 实例到 `T`类型 的显式转换。This operator supports the explicit conversion of the current instance to type `T`, the type of . 此类显式转换的语法依赖于语言。The syntax for such explicit conversions is language-dependent. 你还可以通过调用 方法来执行转换。You may also be able to perform the conversion by calling the method. 此运算符的等效方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is ## Examples 运算符可实现如下所示的代码，该代码将 `Nullable(Of Int32)` 值转换为 值。The operator enables code such as the following, which converts a `Nullable(Of Int32)` value to an value. [!code-csharp[System.Nullable~1.Conversion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullable~1.conversion/cs/explicit1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Nullable~1.Conversion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullable~1.conversion/vb/explicit1.vb#1)]

span.span: A value type.

summary.span: 创建一个新的 对象，并将其初始化为指定的值。

span.span: Creates a new object initialized to a specified value.

returns.span: 一个 对象，其 属性使用 参数进行初始化。

span.span: A object whose property is initialized with the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的 值的 属性初始化为 `value` 参数， 属性初始化为 `true`。The property of the new value is initialized to the `value` parameter and the property is initialized to `true`. 此运算符的等效方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is > [!NOTE] > 在C#和 Visual Basic 中，从 `T` 到 的隐式转换不会调用此运算符，因为这些语言具有用于转换的特殊规则。In C# and Visual Basic, an implicit conversion from `T` to does not invoke this operator because these languages have special rules for the conversion. 提供此运算符是为了使没有此类特殊规则的语言受益。This operator is provided for the benefit of languages that do not have such special rules. > [!NOTE] > 在C#和 Visual Basic 中，从 `null` 或 `Nothing` 文本到 的隐式转换将生成 属性初始化为 的 `false`值。In C# and Visual Basic, an implicit conversion from a `null` or `Nothing` literal to produces a value whose property is initialized to `false`. 转换在编译时以这些语言进行，并且不调用任何运算符。The conversion occurs at compile time in these languages and does not invoke any operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未将类型 `T` 的值分配给 对象，则可以将其与 `null` 和检索其 属性进行比较，但不能访问其 属性或调用其其他成员。If a value of type `T` has not been assigned to the object, you can compare it to `null` and retrieve its property, but you cannot access its property or call its other members. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `Nullable` （`Nullable(Of Integer)` Visual Basic）对象中的 属性来确定它应显示对象的 属性还是显示其 属性。The following example uses the property of a `Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) object to determine whether it should display the object's property or its property.
